forumNotes.author: wimb
forumNotes.content:
Use **Make_IMG.exe** of **U_XP_SET** package to make and install Recovery Console image RECONS.img using XP Setup Source folder as Source.   
You can Install RECONS.img as boot option on any selected Target drive - USB-stick or Harddisk.  

Use previously **Make_USB.exe** to Format USB-stick using Format Stick button.  

See Section 7 in   
[http://www.911cd.net...showtopic=21883](http://www.911cd.net/forums//index.php?showtopic=21883 "External link")
